com.defano.jmonet.model

Interface Quadrilateral

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlexQuadrilateral

    public interface Quadrilateral
    A four-sided, simple polygon (quadrilateral) with no restrictions on the length, angle or parallelness, except that the shape's edges cannot cross each other (self-intersecting quadrilaterals are disallowed).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods
